<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- llvm/ADT/SuffixTreeNode.h - Nodes for SuffixTrees --------&#42;- C++ -&#42;-===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file defines nodes for use within a SuffixTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each node has either no children or at least two children, with the root</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being a exception in the empty tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Children are represented as a map between unsigned integers and nodes. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a node N has a child M on unsigned integer k, then the mapping represented</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by N is a proper prefix of the mapping represented by M. Note that this,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// although similar to a trie is somewhat different: each node stores a full</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// substring of the full mapping rather than a single character state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each internal node contains a pointer to the internal node representing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same string, but with the first character chopped off. This is stored</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in \\p Link. Each leaf node stores the start index of its respective</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// suffix in \\p SuffixIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;SUFFIXTREE&#95;NODE&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;SUFFIXTREE&#95;NODE&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/densemap-h">llvm/ADT/DenseMap.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3">NodeKind</a> &#123; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3ad1b1b9b5c752b94811f35b42dd4f48fe">ST&#95;Leaf</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3a1c5cd656d7af113d4cb72dc8046dc1ad">ST&#95;Internal</a> &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/nodekind">NodeKind</a> Kind;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The start index of this node&#39;s substring in the main string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The length of the string formed by concatenating the edge labels from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the root to this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ConcatLen = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// These two indices give a range of indices for its leaf descendants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Imagine drawing a tree on paper and assigning a unique index to each leaf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// node in monotonically increasing order from left to right. This way of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// numbering the leaf nodes allows us to associate a continuous range of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// indices with each internal node. For example, if a node has leaf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// descendants with indices i, i+1, ..., j, then its LeftLeafIdx is i and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// its RightLeafIdx is j. These indices are for LeafNodes in the SuffixTree</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// class, which is constructed using post-order depth-first traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LeftLeafIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RightLeafIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM RTTI boilerplate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a29aabba4cb1896a6fe8105e057f01d91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3">NodeKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a29aabba4cb1896a6fe8105e057f01d91">getKind</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Kind; &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b">SuffixTreeNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3">NodeKind</a> Kind, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : Kind(Kind), StartIdx(StartIdx) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a67c39a86a8a3f647d11979a1673a5df5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a67c39a86a8a3f647d11979a1673a5df5">~SuffixTreeNode</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A node with two or more children, or the root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aee4f3eefe02d5d475ffb06b54b7da9ed">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b">SuffixTreeNode</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The end index of this node&#39;s substring in the main string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Every leaf node must have its \\p EndIdx incremented at the end of every</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// step in the construction algorithm. To avoid having to update O(N)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nodes individually at the end of every step, the end index is stored</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// as a pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EndIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A pointer to the internal node representing the same sequence with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// first character chopped off.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This acts as a shortcut in Ukkonen&#39;s algorithm. One of the things that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Ukkonen&#39;s algorithm does to achieve linear-time construction is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// keep track of which node the next insert should be at. This makes each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// insert O(1), and there are a total of O(N) inserts. The suffix link</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// helps with inserting children of internal nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Say we add a child to an internal node with associated mapping S. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// next insertion must be at the node representing S - its first character.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is given by the way that we iteratively build the tree in Ukkonen&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// algorithm. The main idea is to look at the suffixes of each prefix in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// string, starting with the longest suffix of the prefix, and ending with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the shortest. Therefore, if we keep pointers between such nodes, we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// move to the next insertion point in O(1) time. If we don&#39;t, then we&#39;d</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// have to query from the root, which takes O(N) time. This would make the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// construction algorithm O(N^2) rather than O(N).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aee4f3eefe02d5d475ffb06b54b7da9ed">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a> &#42;Link = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM RTTI boilerplate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a945ed42e87aca83910a3f79960d00eb7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a945ed42e87aca83910a3f79960d00eb7">classof</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b">SuffixTreeNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3a1c5cd656d7af113d4cb72dc8046dc1ad">NodeKind::ST&#95;Internal</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The children of this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A child existing on an unsigned integer implies that from the mapping</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// represented by the current node, there is a way to reach another</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// mapping by tacking that character on the end of the current string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a244b1a8b6c26960faf2663376005ca7a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;unsigned, SuffixTreeNode &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a244b1a8b6c26960faf2663376005ca7a">Children</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aee4f3eefe02d5d475ffb06b54b7da9ed"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aee4f3eefe02d5d475ffb06b54b7da9ed">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartIdx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EndIdx,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The start index of the suffix represented by this leaf.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SuffixIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The end index of this node&#39;s substring in the main string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Every leaf node must have its \\p EndIdx incremented at the end of every</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// step in the construction algorithm. To avoid having to update O(N)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nodes individually at the end of every step, the end index is stored</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// as a pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;EndIdx = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
